messagesOnSuccess: Good morning, Doctor. Doesn't earth look dashing today?
Why don't you go out for a walk and get some fresh air?
By the way, I need you to upload your daily log before I can let you out.
Find your personal floppy and insert it into this terminal.

messagesOnRejection: I don't know where it is! Should look around...
messagesOnSuccess: Ha! This entry is from last night.
You left your toolbox in the hangar?
Well, I guess I'll have to open the hatch for you.
